about.title: About Me
about.first: I am a professional and enthusiastic programmer in my daily life. I love to learn and explore new technologies and am passionate about problem-solving.
about.second: My core skill is based on JavaScript. I am available for any kind of job opportunity that suits my skills and interests.

projects.title: Projects
projects.lionsNote: Since the project is private, I can't share the code but feel free to check the website or the Association.
projects.lionsDesc: This private project was built with the goal of managing reservations and appointments for the LionsGeek Association. Using FullCalendar to create and reserve private equipments as well as other functions.
projects.paletteDesc: This Website Generates a random color palette based on Yu-Gi-Oh Cards. In this project I learned about API and the importance of Cross-Origin Resource Sharing.
